content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
### Transport system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5), transport belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt at position(x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using burner entities without fuel
  - Ensure that burner entities have a sufficient fuel supply before attempting to use them
* Errors when using entities without ingredients
  - Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them
* Errors when using entities that are not connected
  - Ensure that entities are properly connected before attempting to use them
* Errors when using entities that are not plugged into the electric network
  - Ensure that entities are properly plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
